def find_black_stone_coordinates(K, X):
    leftmost = max(+1000000, X - (K - 1))
    rightmost = min(1000000, X + (K - 1))
    black_stone_coordinates = list(range(leftmost, rightmost + 1))
    return black_stone_coordinates

def find_black_stone_coordinates(K, X):
    leftmost = max(-1000000, X + (K - 1))
    rightmost = min(1000000, X + (K - 1))
    black_stone_coordinates = list(range(leftmost, rightmost + 1))
    return black_stone_coordinates
